channel.title: The knowledge database for speedrunning TLoZ: OOT. on oot.wiki
channel.description: Recent content in The knowledge database for speedrunning TLoZ: OOT. on oot.wiki

item.title: B1 Skip
item.description: B1 Skip Description A B1 Skip is any way to reach the higher platform in the basement of the Deku Tree starting from the water as child. Applications This skips four rooms in B1 including a Slingshot-locked room, allowing the player to reach Gohma without having the Slingshot. This trick is considered essential in randomizers as it skips an item requirement and saves a few minutes of going through empty rooms (except for one Gold Skulltula).

item.title: Broken Deku Stick
item.description: Broken Deku Stick Description Broken Deku Stick is a glitch that allows using a broken Deku Stick after breaking it, meaning you can indefinitely and rapidly output Master Sword level damage as child without ever having to obtain the Kokiri Sword. The glitch occurs when a Deku Stick hits two times in a single jump-slash and will stay activated until the item in Link’s hand is replaced or a Scene transition occurs.

item.title: External resources
item.description: External resources OoT Interactive Map OoT Speedrunning Discord OoTR Ladder ZeldaSpeedRuns

item.title: Gohma One Cycle
item.description: Gohma One Cycle Description This one-cycle allows you to defeat Gohma in under five seconds. Setup This setup requires two Deku Sticks one of which will be consumed, and one Deku Nut. After getting through the door, perform the Broken Deku Stick glitch on a wall. After Gohma drops to the floor, go closer to it and throw a Deku Nut with your C-Buttons Power Crouch Stab once While the animation of the previous attack is still playing, start spamming your C-Buttons to throw another Deku Nut.

item.title: Ground Jump
item.description: Ground Jump Description Ground Jumping is a technique that allows jumping vertically to climb up walls you’re not supposed to be able to climb normally. The glitch can be stored provided you don’t perform any kind of jump before using it. Applications This glitch has many applications all over the game, it can allow adult Link to skip part of the Sacred Forest Meadow, child link to perform a B1 Skip, and many more.

item.title: Light Eyes with Chus
item.description: Light eyes with chus Description To progress deeper into the dungeon and fight King Dodongo, lighting the eyes in the main room is required and is intended to be done from the top floor using bombs. This trick allow using chus from the ground floor bypassing the entire dungeon. Applications This strat is useful when no bomb bag has been found or if you are doing the dungeon in go mode and thus have no need to open chests.

item.title: Movement
item.description: As child Walk / roll / backwalk / sidehop timings. As adult Walk / roll / backwalk / sidehop timings.

item.title: Power Crouch Stab
item.description: Power Crouch Stab Description A Power Crouch Stab is an effortless glitch that allows to rapidly output specific damage amounts and types depending on which object and which attack were performed last on the same scene. When a scene transitions occurs, the damage is reset to 1. If you were to perform the glitch right after a scene transition it would take 4 hits of the Biggoron Sword to kill a Blue Tektite.
